heroData.headline: Comprehensive Solutions for Every Industry
heroData.subHeadline: From infrastructure to logistics, AL BAIDA GROUP leads the way.

about.companySubtitle: Business is in our breath. That's how we always make it the best.
about.companyDescription: We are a paramount group of business services in various genres such as facility management, transport & logistics, construction & engineering, plant hire & heavy machinery rental, real estate, and agriculture trading. Established in 1970, Al Baida Group has built and maintained a group of companies encompassing various commercial sectors ranging from facility management to infrastructure services and more.

contactUs.title: Do you have any questions?
contactUs.subTitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions or need assistance, our team is ready to help. Contact us via our form, phone, or email, and let's build a successful future together.
contactUs.askUs: Ask us everything and we would love to hear from you

services.title: Facility Management
services.description: We offer complete integrated facility solutions that help leverage a smooth functioning of your business facility.

services.title: Agriculture projects & training
services.description: The world is nothing with no pastures and peasants. Agriculture is the sole reason for our very existence.

services.title: Contracting & Trading
services.description: Al Baida Group is a company driven by a vision aligned to the National Vision of Qatar. We go beyond mere transactions, instead building mutually beneficial relationships with our clients.

services.title: Infrastructure & project development
services.description: Infrastructure is truly the backbone of growth and prosperity of a nation. Our venture in the sector of road construction has delivered and developed world-class projects in Qatar.

services.title: Cleaning Services
services.description: Al Baida Group has made its distinct name for the last 20 years in providing exceptional cleaning services for post-construction & commercial cleaning and residential cleaning.

services.title: Heavy Equipment Rental
services.description: Heavy equipment is an indispensable section for a flourishing industry. The equipment requirement varies based on market segments.

services.title: HR Management & Outsourcing
services.description: With a stringent selection procedure, we can provide a range of workforce to meet our clients' needs, ranging from clerks to IT professionals and Project Managers.

services.title: Cargo logistics & Custom Clearance
services.description: Al Baida Cargo & Customs Clearance is considered a unique company in the field of Cargo & Customs Clearance.

services.title: Engineering Consultancy
services.description: Al Baida Group Engineering Consultancy team is made up of well-experienced, qualified, and dedicated team of Architects and Engineers and familiarized in obtaining approvals from concerned Government Authorities.

services.title: Business Management Consultancy
services.description: We offer a variety of business and management consulting services that support your business needs. We offer solutions to support your growth plan and optimize your organization.

services.title: Agency Representation
services.description: Al Baida has been a Business conglomerate since 1970, maintaining strong business ties within Qatar. AL Baida assists agencies in gaining representation in Qatar.

services.title: Construction
services.description: We specialize in building construction, including ground plus two stories, warehouses, mosques, villa complexes, fencing, and other construction projects.
